title: Why I'm Learning Hacking
content:
Hacking isn’t about destruction — it’s about understanding. I started learning cybersecurity to understand the systems we rely on daily and how they can be exploited or protected.

My goal is to compete in CTFs, contribute to open-source security tools, and eventually monetize my skills through ethical bug bounty programs.

This journey isn't about breaking things — it's about building a better, safer digital world.
author: robert
